text: Hi Everyone! I work at Airtable and we're hiring for folks on the platform engineering team. You'll be working on the future of our blocks platform, which are essentially apps that run on top of the database.  This includes low-code / no-code integrations for end-users among other exciting projects to be announced.  DM if you're interested and would like a referral! <https://www.keyvalues.com/airtable>

attachments.title: Airtable Engineering Culture | Key Values
attachments.text: Engineers at Airtable talk about their culture, key values, current team members, open jobs, and what it is like working at Airtable.
attachments.fallback: Key Values: Airtable Engineering Culture | Key Values
